description: Relevant Courses: Introduction to Computer Graphics, Numerical Computation, Human-Computer Interaction, Operating Systems, Algorithms, User Interfaces, Introduction to AI, Software Testing and Quality Assurance, Introduction to Database Management, Software Engineering Principles, Introduction to the Theory of Computing, Introduction to Combinatorics, Linear Algebra for Engineering
Awards: 5x Term Dean's Honours List, President's Scholarship of Distinction, President's Research Award
Awards: Governor General's Academic Medal, Carman E. Pollock Memorial Mathematics Plaque
